creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: sixteen long narrow panels, sewn together at long edges; alternating panels: pink with grey-green grid lines and bands of yellow, red and grey embroidery; light and dark blue abstract pattern with red stripe; red and pink bands with black stripes; dark blue, light blue and white stripes; short folded and sewn hem along short edges
title: Wrapper
